Notes: A nozzle that periodically generates several air bubbles that replenish the player's air when underwater.

Obj_arg0.Name: Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: Time between bubble spawns in frames.

Obj_arg1.Name: Duration
Obj_arg1.Description: Life duration of a single bubble in frames.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.
